basics.name: Revathi
basics.label: B.Tech Artificial Intelligence Student
basics.summary: Third-year B.Tech Artificial Intelligence student with strong interest in Python, Machine Learning, DBMS, and basic web development. Skilled in building small data-driven applications and beginner-level AI systems. Actively seeking internship opportunities to gain hands-on industry experience.

education.institution: SRM Institute of Science and Technology

projects.name: Crop Recommendation System
projects.description: Designed a DBMS-based crop recommendation system that stores and processes soil nutrient values, farmer details, and fertilizer information. Generated crop suggestions using rule-based logic and SQL queries without ML models.

projects.name: House Price Prediction
projects.description: Performed data cleaning, feature preprocessing, outlier handling, and visualization to analyze Bengaluru house price patterns. Implemented regression logic to understand price trends.

projects.name: Guess the Number Game
projects.description: Created an interactive number-guessing game using Python. Used NumPy for random number generation and Pandas to store game history with attempt tracking.

certificates.name: Generative AI Workshop
certificates.summary: Hands-on sessions on Generative AI, prompt engineering, and practical applications.
